Reference version 0.1

Canned Estimators

linear_regressor

Linear regressor model.

linear_classifier

Linear classifier model.

linear_dnn_combined_regressor

Linear DNN Combined Regression

linear_dnn_combined_classifier

Linear DNN Combined Classification

svm_classifier

TensorFlow -- Support Vector Machines

dynamic_rnn

Dynamic RNN Estimator

state_saving_rnn

State Saving RNN Estimator

Estimator Methods

input_fn

Input function constructor from various types of input used to feed the estimator

train

Trains a model given training data input_fn.

predict

Returns predictions for given features.

evaluate

Evaluates the model given evaluation data input_fn.

export_savedmodel

Exports inference graph as a SavedModel into a given directory.

coef

Get the list coefficients or variables from this model's checkpoint.

Feature Columns

feature_columns

Construct column placeholders from vectors in an R object

column_categorical_with_vocabulary_list

A _CategoricalColumn with in-memory vocabulary.

column_categorical_with_vocabulary_file

A _CategoricalColumn with a vocabulary file.

column_categorical_with_identity

A _CategoricalColumn that returns identity values.

column_categorical_with_hash_bucket

Represents sparse feature where ids are set by hashing.

column_indicator

Represents multi-hot representation of given categorical column.

column_numeric

Represents real valued or numerical features.

column_embedding

_DenseColumn that converts from sparse, categorical input.

column_crossed

Returns a column for performing crosses of categorical features.

column_weighted_categorical

Applies weight values to a _CategoricalColumn.

column_bucketized

Represents discretized dense input.

Custom Estimators

estimator

Custom estimator constructor

estimator_spec

Ops and objects returned from a model_fn and passed to Estimator.

Experiment API

experiment

Experiment constructor

train

Fit the estimator using the training data.

evaluate

Evaluate on the evaluation data.

train_and_evaluate

Interleaves training and evaluation.

Run Hooks

EstimatorSessionRunHook

Base R6 class for creating custom SessionRunHook

hook_checkpoint_saver

Saves checkpoints every N steps or seconds.

hook_global_step_waiter

Delay execution until global step reaches to wait_until_step.

hook_logging_tensor

Prints the given tensors once every N local steps or once every N seconds.

hook_nan_tensor

NaN Loss monitor.

hook_step_counter

Steps per second monitor.

hook_stop_at_step

Monitor to request stop at a specified step.

hook_summary_saver

Saves summaries every N steps.

Run Configuration

run_config

Run Configuration

task_type

Task Types
